item.description:
Our meet up group is turning 4 years old this month, so join us for dinner and drinks and help us celebrate! Over the past 4 years a lot of great friendships have been made and we have been to lots of fun events. We're especially looking forward to having new members join us!

Each member pays for his/her own food/drinks. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, be sure to update your RSVP. It is important that we have an accurate headcount.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) at our table or near hostess area. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Dinner and Celebration of Meet Up Group's 4th Anniversary: Aegean Restaurant
